column6:
"ULTIMATE KNIGHTS" PART 2 (OF 3),2007,3
If you thought Peter would get some time off after the soul-shattering changes that came at the end of "Clone Saga," think again! Things keep heating up, as Ultimate Daredevil attempts to enlist Spider-Man in a crusade to bring down the Kingpin-permanently. But with his Aunt's life hanging by a thread and his serious girl problems...not to mention the new student at Midtown High...crime-busting may be the last thing on young Mr. Parker's mind. So what happens when the rest of Daredevil's new super-team shows up? Learn who stands with Peter-and who stands against him!
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:Andrew Hennessy | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Justin Ponsor
